name: NaturalDisastersHangman-withdisplay
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: natural disasters hangman
des:
The classic hangman game with display. This time comes with a Natural Disasters theme!

Guess the word by saying letters (e.g. "A"). If your Alexa device doesn't have a screen, you may still check your hangman progress by saying "Progress". When the game ends, if you want to know some fun facts about that natural disasters, say "yes" to know more, or say "no" if you want to start a new game.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
